item.description:
The unique Soul Stirring mystical variety shows continue to give hope for a future of diversity in inspiration. Drawing upon dreams, meditations, religion, nature, and more: a full evening's presentation of an amazing variety of original paintings, readings, story, and song by many local spiritual artists.

The 2010 show offers a particularly rich selection of music, including professional singer-songwriter ensembles, classical piano meditations, and powerful soul singing, plus poetry, ritual, a new book presentation on the essentials of spiritual time management, and a beautiful variety of inspirational art. Join us for this rare opportunity to meet fellow seekers who have something transcendent to say with their creativity!

Cambridge Swedenborg Chapel, 50 Quincy St. Cambridge, MA. This a lovely Gothic stone chapel across from Harvard's Sanders Theatre (Memorial Hall) in Harvard Square. Not wheelchair accessible yet, sorry.

For directions and more information see: http://www.soulstirri...
Participating artists see guidelines: http://www.soulstirri...

Saturday, October 9, 2010 at 7pm-9:30pm (your $5-$10 sliding scale admission will help defray many costs)

Two approximately 45-minute segments of performer presentations, with a twenty minute break around 8pm. Paintings and drawings with artist statements displayed on the walls. Refreshments and reception to follow; book signings, postcards, information sharing, and more.
item.name: The Mystical Art & Talent Show
